description:
In the game you'll find over 60 erotic illustrations.

-Emy will be presented in her standard everyday attire, a maid-catgirl costume and in a tight suit with a cat mask.
-Nia will be presented in her standard everyday attire, a bunny costume and in a tight suit.
-Uma will be presented in her standard everyday attire, a casual outfit (plaid skirt and schoolgirl shirt) and in a tight pink suit with a cap.
-Six will be in a strict classic suit (Men in Black), a swimsuit and in a tight suit.
name: EmyLiveShow: Hentai Puzzle Game
intro: As the "yarn unrolls" between unique puzzle-like pics, Emy, Nia, Uma, and Six will rock up before the player for the first time in more dinkum and easy-going forms.
